LanguageData.Ammo_338Lapua_FMJ.label: .338 Lapua Magnum cartridge (FMJ)
LanguageData.Ammo_338Lapua_FMJ.description: The .338 Lapua Magnum (8.6×70mm or 8.58×70mm) is a rimless, bottlenecked, centerfire cartridge developed for military long-range sniper rifles.

LanguageData.Ammo_338Lapua_Sabot.description: The .338 Lapua Magnum (8.6×70mm or 8.58×70mm) is a rimless, bottlenecked, centerfire cartridge developed for military long-range sniper rifles.
